children.name: hover
children.description: The hover state for a single point marker.

children.name: inactive
children.description: The opposite state of a hover for a single point node. Applied to all not connected nodes to the hovered one.

children.name: normal
children.description: The normal state of a single point marker. Currently only used for setting animation when returning to normal state from hover.

children.name: select
children.description: The appearance of the point marker when selected. In order to allow a point to be selected, set the series.allowPointSelect option to true.
